overview: "Juvenile Abilities Incident" is a side story of "Youth Class". It was created by Li Yang, the director of "The Adventures of Li Xianji". The original team of the juvenile class fought for their lives to star in the talented young man who mutated in seconds. The special commissioner codenamed No. 403 risked his life to reveal a piece of "history" that has been hidden for a long time!
title: 少年异能事件
